title: Van Gogh Today
description: ** An entirely new genre of fiction **Van Gogh Today contains six short stories of lives that were touched in some way or another by the artist. They are a reflection of the power of his story, and why Van Gogh remains a timeless inspiration to us all.>> Excellent read - Cyril Bassington-Bassington>> Riveting - Stacy Louise>> Buy it. You'll be glad you did! - Baron
author: Liesbeth Heenk
